proverb.data: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it.The time will pass anyway.
proverb.explain: 永远不要因为梦想需要太长时间实现而放弃。时间总会逝去。

proverb.data: Life is like a fable. Its values lies not in its length,but in its content.
proverb.explain: 生命如寓言，其价值不在于长短，而在于内容

words.explain: n.说谎 v.躺下 在于

proverb.data: Great minds discuss ideals.Average minds discuss events.Small minds discuss people.
proverb.explain: 大智论道，中智论事，小智论人
proverb.a: discuss 从不用作不及物动词。

proverb.data: An idealist is a person who helps other people to be prosperous.
proverb.explain: 理想主义者是那些帮助他人获得成就的人。
proverb.a: 后缀 .ist 通常是某种信仰者，专家，从事某种职业的人，从事某种研究，与某事物有关的人

proverb.data: It is one of my sources of happiness never to desire a knowledge of other people's business.
proverb.explain: 我的快乐源泉之一就是不去管别人的闲事。

proverb.data: Confidence has nothing to do with what you look like. If you obsess over that, you'll end up being disappointed in yourself all the time.
proverb.explain: 自信与外表无关，如果你沉溺于此，便会一直对自己失望
